Articles.Content:
So I have been looking around for a while looking for mods for stuff like missiles, cannons, guns, rockets , etc. Anyone know any good and up-to-date mods for this?

First post, Please have mercy.

We won't shoot you for posting Drakej

This is one mod that comes to mind: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-0-25-BDArmory-v0-6-1-2-Dev-Thread-%28phys-range-fixes-%29-Oct-27

We won't shoot you for posting Drakej

This is one mod that comes to mind: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-0-25-BDArmory-v0-6-1-2-Dev-Thread-%28phys-range-fixes-%29-Oct-27

I remember seeing this mod a while back before I got the full game (So of course my game was out of date as to where it wouldn't work). I had forgotten about it entirely! After getting the mod, it's pretty awesome. Good find!

And thus the hunt continues for moar tanks/rover/car stuff
